#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;

long long int ways[5002][5002];

#define mod 1000000007

int main()
{
    long long m,n,p,x,b,c;
    cin>>m>>n>>p;
	int i,j;
	for(i=0;i<=m;i++)
	{
		for(j=0;j<=n;j++)
		 ways[i][j]=0;
	}
	
    for(i=0;i<p;i++)
    {
        cin>>b>>c;
        ways[b][c]=-1;
    }
    for(i=1;i<=m;i++)
    {
        if(ways[i][1]==-1)
            break;
        else
            ways[i][1]=1;
    }
    
    for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{
		if(ways[1][i]==-1)
		 break;
		 
		ways[1][i]=1;
	}
    
    for(i=2;i<=m;i++)
	{
		for(j=2;j<=n;j++)
		{
            if(ways[i][j]!=-1)
            {
            	if(ways[i-1][j]!=-1)
            	 ways[i][j]+=ways[i-1][j];
            	 
            	 
            	 ways[i][j]%=mod;
            	 
            	if(ways[i][j-1]!=-1)
            	 ways[i][j]+= ways[i][j-1];
            	 
            	ways[i][j]%=mod;
            	 
            }
		}
	}
	
    if(ways[m][n]==-1)
        cout<<"0\n";
    else
    {
        x=ways[m][n]%mod;
        cout<<x<<"\n";
    }
}
